https://tmrev.io/movie/397997-1937: Masacre de Ponce 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null The Ponce Massacre took place on March 21, 1937 in Ponce, Puerto Rico, when a peaceful civilian march turned into a police shooting. 19 civilians and two policemen were killed, with more than 200 others wounded. It remains the largest massacre in post-Spanish imperial history in Puerto Rico. 1937: Masacre de Ponce
